title: South Africa : number of Facebook users 2017 to 2023
summary: This statistic shows the Number of Facebook users in South Africa from 2017 to 2023 .
In 2018 , there were around 16.2 millions number Facebook users in South Africa , and this figure is projected to grow 19.8 millions in 2023 .
gold: This statistic shows the number of Facebook users in South Africa from 2017 to 2023.
In 2023 , the number of Facebook users in South Africa is expected to reach 19.8 million , up from 16.2 million users in 2018 .
